page.title: 06Refreshment Room, Ryde Pier
page.content: The buffet bar is open from 8.30a.m. to 8.00p.m. The staff change shift at 2.30p.m. The busiest times of day are early morning,lunch time and teatime.The ladies in the bar have to be very patient in the summer because lots of the visitors are foreign and do not all speak good English or understand the money. There are also regular passengers who work on the mainland and live on the island.Sometimes there are prisoners from one of the Island's three prisons being transferred or people coming to visit them.
